Class PeriodField

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  ch.ethz.csb.youscope.client.uielements.PeriodField
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PeriodField
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Field which allows to define a period in any unit. Internally uses ms.

Author:
Moritz Lang
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

PeriodField

public PeriodField()
Shortcut to create a period field with all periods from milli second to days.

PeriodField

public PeriodField(TimeUnit[] units)
Constructor. Constructs a period field with the given time units to choose from.

Parameters:
units - Units of time to choose from.
Method Detail

setDuration

public void setDuration(int timeInMs)
Sets the duration in ms. Automatically adjusts the unit to represent the time in the "highest" unit with which it is representable as an integer value.

Parameters:
timeInMs - Time duration, measured in ms.

getDuration

public int getDuration()
Returns the duration in ms. Automatically handles the conversion from the currently selected unit.

Returns:
Duration in ms.
